players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I'm shocked that Alice was killed. We need to discuss and share suspicions to find the mafioso."
Diana: "I'm just as shocked as you, Charlie. We should all share our thoughts and not rush to judgments."
Diana: "I'm starting to get suspicious of Bob since he hasn't shared anything yet. We need him to speak up."
Charlie: "I think Diana has a point. Bob, please share your thoughts so we can figure this out."
You: "I am the detective and I have identified Diana as the mafioso. However, I will need more information to confirm this."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
